page.title: 15CHILDREN'S GAMES-SPETISBURY
page.content: I like to play many games.These are two of my favourites.This is how you play"it".You get some of your friends together and you choose someone to be "it".Now to be "it" means you are the goodie and you are trying to touch your friends who are the baddies.When you touch them they become the goodie and whoever was "it" becomes a baddy. Another one of my favourite games is Pacman.You have to have about 2O people one of them has to be Pacman. When you are Pacman you move your arms up and down and try to catch one of the other people who are trying to escape from Pacman.If Pacman gets a person they become a Pacman too. .
